channel.title: [req]Npc for dicing[req]
channel.description: Can anyone make or give me a dicing npc. when you talk to here you enter the ammount of coins you want to 55x2 and she rolls and if she rolls under 55 she keeps the money and if she rolls over 55 you talk to her and get double your money or it just appears in your invo. Im begging for it =]!!

item.title: [req]Npc for dicing[req]
item.dc:creator: @leon_lad leon lad
item.description:
@leon_lad wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:5, topic:443985”][quote author=leon lad link=topic=546673.msg4007693#msg4007693 date=1338833350]

[quote]We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Do tell me, what have you tried thus far?
[/quote]well i have tried to edit the gambaler in donator zone but it didnt work
[/quote]

Can you show me what you tried? (code)[/quote]
i dont know how to get it to give you double your money instead of random items add my skype leonlad1 see if you can help me. !!

Read full topic
